net.sf.mmm.util.lang.base

Class ErrorMessage

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.mmm.util.lang.base.AbstractMessage
      • net.sf.mmm.util.lang.base.AbstractErrorMessage
        • net.sf.mmm.util.lang.base.ErrorMessage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, AttributeReadMessage, AttributeReadMessageCode, AttributeReadUuid, Message

    public class ErrorMessage
extends AbstractErrorMessage
    This is the implementation of an error Message that is already localized.
    Since:
    4.0.0
    Author:
    Joerg Hohwiller (hohwille at users.sourceforge.net)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
